board.name: CYW920706WCDEVAL
board.summary: The Infineon CYW920706WCDEVAL Evaluation Kit enables you to evaluate and develop single-chip Bluetooth® applications using the CYW20706, an ultra-low-power dual-mode Bluetooth® 5.2 wireless MCU device. The CYW20706 is a stand-alone baseband processor with an integrated 2.4 GHz transceiver supporting LE/BR/EDR. The CYW20706 employs high integration to reduce external components, thereby minimizing the device's footprint and cost. This kit helps evaluate device functionality and develop applications quickly for faster time-to-market.
board.prov_capabilities: ble br_edr mesh hid audio ota hal btsdk CYW920706WCDEVAL
board.description:
Kit Features:
  • CYW20706 is a monolithic, single chip, Bluetooth® dual-mode system on chip that includes a baseband processor, an Arm® Cortex®-M3 processor, and an integrated transceiver.
  • The Infineon CYW920706WCDEVAL board is an evaluation board that provides various pins, jumpers, switches, ports, and test points to access CYW20706 to perform debug, evaluation, and troubleshooting.

board.name: CYBT-333047-EVAL
board.summary: The Infineon AIROC™ CYW20706 Bluetooth® and Bluetooth® LE module evaluation kit (CYBT-333047-EVAL) enables evaluation, prototyping, and development of a wide array of IoT applications using the AIROC™ CYW20706, a low-power Bluetooth® and Bluetooth® LE system on chip.
board.prov_capabilities: btstack10 ble br_edr mesh hid audio ota hal btsdk CYBT_333047_EVAL
board.description:
The AIROC™ CYW20706 Bluetooth® and Bluetooth® LE system on chip provides reliable Bluetooth® connectivity, along with compute capability integrating an Arm® Cortex®-M3 processor. This evaluation kit (CYBT-333047-EVAL) includes an Infineon in-house AIROC™ Bluetooth® Module hosting the AIROC™ CYW20706 that is globally certified and has uFL connector for external antenna designed for reducing time-to-market.

The AIROC™ CYW20706 Bluetooth® and Bluetooth® LE module evaluation kit (CYBLE-333047-EVAL) is supported in the AIROC™ Bluetooth® SDK within ModusToolbox™ Software and Tools with copious code examples and documentation.
Kit Features:
  • AIROC™ CYW20706 Bluetooth® and Bluetooth® LE module (CYBLE-333047-02)
  • Arduino compatible headers for hardware expansion
  • USB connector for power, programming, and USB-UART bridge

Kit Contents:
  • CYBT-333047-EVAL module evaluation board
  • USB Standard-A to Micro-B cable

board.name: CYW920819EVB-02
board.summary: The Infineon CYW920819EVB-02 Evaluation Kit enables you to evaluate and develop single-chip Bluetooth® applications using the CYW20819, an ultra-low-power dual-mode Bluetooth® 5.4 wireless MCU device. The CYW20819 is a stand-alone baseband processor with an integrated 2.4 GHz transceiver supporting LE/BR/EDR. Manufactured using advanced CMOS low-power process, the CYW20819 employs high integration to reduce external components, thereby minimizing the device's footprint and cost. This kit helps evaluate device functionality and develop applications quickly for faster time-to-market.
board.prov_capabilities: ble br_edr mesh hid audio ota hal btsdk CYW920819EVB_02 fw2 lsm9ds1 ncu15wf104 led2x button CYW208XX CYW208XX_62fbga
board.description:
Kit Features:
  • 62-FBGA CYW20819 dual-mode (LE/BR/EDR) Bluetooth® 5.4-compliant wireless MCU
  • Arduino compatible headers for hardware expansion
  • On-board sensors - a lsm9ds1 9-axis motion sensor (3D digital linear acceleration sensor, 3D digital angular rate sensor, and 3D digital magnetic sensor) and a ncu15wf104 thermistor
  • User switches and LEDs
  • USB connector for power, programming, and USB-UART bridge

Kit Contents:
  • CYW920819EVB-02 Evaluation board
  • USB Standard-A to Micro-B cable
  • Quick Start Guide

board.name: CYW920819M2EVB-01
board.summary:
The Infineon AIROC™ CYW20819 Bluetooth® and Bluetooth® LE evaluation kit (CYW920819M2EVB-01) enables evaluation, prototyping, and development of a wide array of IoT applications using the AIROC™ CYW20819, an ultra-low-power dual-mode Bluetooth® 5.4 system on chip.

The AIROC™ CYW20819 Bluetooth® and Bluetooth® LE system on chip provides reliable Bluetooth® connectivity, core spec compliant to 5.4, along with high performance compute capability integrating an Arm® Cortex®-M4 processor with floating point unit. It is a highly integrated device which delivers up to 11.5 dBm transmit power in LE and BR modes and up to 2.5 dBm in EDR mode. The AIROC™ CYW20819 is designed to support a wide range of Bluetooth® use cases for home and industrial automation, lighting, and sensor nodes.

The AIROC™ CYW20819 Bluetooth® and Bluetooth® LE evaluation kit (CYW920819M2EVB-01) and the AIROC™ Bluetooth® SDK along with ModusToolbox™ software and tools form a powerful but easy to use toolset that helps developers create amazing Bluetooth® enabled IoT solutions.
board.prov_capabilities: ble br_edr mesh hid audio ota hal btsdk fw2 CYW920819M2EVB_01 ncu15wf104 led2x button CYW208XX CYW208XX_62fbga
board.description:
Kit Features:
  • AIROC™ CYW20819 Bluetooth® and Bluetooth® LE system on chip in 62 pin FPBGA package
  • Arduino compatible headers for hardware expansion
  • On-board sensors - an ambient light sensor, thermistor, footprint for analog microphone, and footprint for Infineon digital microphone
  • User switches and LEDs
  • USB connector for power, programming, and USB-UART bridge

Kit Contents:
  • Base Board - CYW9BTM2BASE2
  • CYW920819M2IPA1 Bluetooth® Module Evaluation Board (mounted onto baseboard)
  • USB Standard-A to Micro-B cable

board.name: CYBT-213043-MESH
board.summary: The EZ-BT Mesh Evaluation Kit (CYBT-213043-MESH) enables you to evaluate SIG Mesh functionality and features using the EZ-BT AIROC™ Module CYBT-213043-02. The CYBT-213043-02 EZ-BT AIROC™ Module is an integrated, fully certified, 12.0 mm x 16.61 mm x 1.70 mm, programmable dual-mode Bluetooth® module designed to reduce your time-to-market. The CYBT-213043-02 module utilizes the Infineon CYW20819 silicon device.
board.prov_capabilities: ble br_edr mesh hid ota hal btsdk fw2 CYBT_213043_MESH
board.description:
Kit Features:
  • CYW20819-based dual-mode (LE/BR/EDR) Bluetooth® 5.4-compliant fully certified module (CYBT-213043-02)
  • On-Board Sensor for Mesh Application Development (Thermistor, ALS, PIR Motion Sensor)
  • On-Board RGB LED with additional 1MB External Serial Flash
  • Bluetooth® Low Energy (LE), Bluetooth® Basic Rate (BR) and Enhanced Data Rate (EDR)
  • FCC, ISED, MIC, and CE Certified Module on board (CYBT-213043-02)
  • Bluetooth® 5.4 with SIG MESH Qualified Module (CYBT-213043-02)
  • USB connector for power, programming, and USB-UART bridge
Kit Contents:
  • 4x Mesh Evaluation Boards
  • 4x USB-A to USB Micro-B Cables
  • 1x Quick Start Guide

board.name: Vela-IF820-INT-ANT-DVK
board.summary: The Vela IF820 includes multiple small form factor PCB modules to suit any host board footprint and targets both hosted and hostless applications. They're accompanied by low cost, easy to use development kits and the addition of a certified, packaged USB Adapter to add Classic Bluetooth® and Bluetooth® LE connectivity to a variety of additional products in your Bluetooth® portfolio. Together, Infineon and Laird Connectivity drive down your total cost of ownership, design complexity and risk, while ensuring you the fastest time to market for your next dual mode Bluetooth® IoT design. See Vela IF820 Series - Bluetooth 5.4 Dual-Mode Modules for more information.
board.prov_capabilities: ble br_edr mesh hid ota hal btsdk fw2 Vela_IF820_INT_ANT_DVK
board.description:
Kit Features:
  • Vela IF820 module (Part # 453-00171) using CYW20820-based silicon
  • Dual-mode Bluetooth® (LE/BR/EDR) and Bluetooth® 5.4 certified
  • FCC, ISED, CE, UKCA, MIC, RCM and KCC Certified Module on board (Part # 453-00171)
  • DVK supports MikroBus and Qwicc connectors for easy sensor board additions
  • Simple headers and jumpers for all I/O
  • LEDs, buttons and switches

Kit Contents:
  • 1 X Vela IF820 Integrated Antenna DVK Board (453-00171-K1) with on-board Vela IF820 Module
  • 1 X USB Cable

board.name: CYW920820EVB-02
board.summary: The Infineon CYW920820EVB-02 Evaluation Kit enables you to evaluate and develop single-chip Bluetooth® applications using the CYW20820, an ultra-low-power dual-mode Bluetooth® 5.4 wireless MCU device. The CYW20820 is a stand-alone baseband processor with an integrated 2.4 GHz transceiver supporting LE/BR/EDR. The CYW20820 delivers up to 10.5 dBm Tx power in LE and BR modes and up to 4 dBm in EDR mode that extends range in applications like home and industrial automation, wearables, toys, and HID. The CYW20820 employs high integration to reduce external components, thereby minimizing the device's footprint and cost. This kit helps evaluate device functionality and develop applications quickly for faster time-to-market.
board.prov_capabilities: ble br_edr mesh hid audio ota hal btsdk fw2 CYW920820EVB_02 lsm9ds1 ncu15wf104 led2x button CYW208XX CYW208XX_62fbga
board.description:
Kit Features:
  • 62-FBGA CYW20820 dual-mode (LE/BR/EDR) Bluetooth® 5.4-compliant wireless MCU with internal Power Amplifier (iPA)
  • Arduino compatible headers for hardware expansion
  • On-board sensors - a lsm9ds1 9-axis motion sensor (3D digital linear acceleration sensor, 3D digital angular rate sensor, and 3D digital magnetic sensor) and a ncu15wf104 thermistor
  • User switches and LEDs
  • USB connector for power, programming, and USB-UART bridge

Kit Contents:
  • CYW920820EVB-02 Evaluation board
  • USB Standard-A to Micro-B cable
  • Quick Start Guide

board.name: CYW920820M2EVB-01
board.summary:
The Infineon AIROC™ CYW20820 Bluetooth® and Bluetooth® LE evaluation kit (CYW920820M2EVB-01) enables evaluation, prototyping, and development of a wide array of IoT applications using the AIROC™ CYW20820, an ultra-low-power dual-mode Bluetooth® 5.4 system on chip.

The AIROC™ CYW20820 Bluetooth® and Bluetooth® LE system on chip provides reliable Bluetooth® connectivity, core spec compliant to 5.4, along with high performance compute capability integrating an Arm® Cortex®-M4 processor with floating point unit. It is a highly integrated device which delivers up to 11.5 dBm transmit power in LE and BR modes and up to 2.5 dBm in EDR mode. The AIROC™ CYW20820 is designed to support a wide range of Bluetooth® use cases for home and industrial automation, lighting, and sensor nodes.

The AIROC™ CYW20820 Bluetooth® and Bluetooth® LE evaluation kit (CYW920820M2EVB-01) and the AIROC™ Bluetooth® SDK along with ModusToolbox™ software and tools form a powerful but easy to use toolset that helps developers create amazing Bluetooth® enabled IoT solutions.
board.prov_capabilities: ble br_edr mesh hid audio ota hal btsdk fw2 CYW920820M2EVB_01 ncu15wf104 led2x button CYW208XX CYW208XX_62fbga
board.description:
Kit Features:
  • AIROC™ CYW20820 Bluetooth® and Bluetooth® LE system on chip in 62 pin FPBGA package
  • Arduino compatible headers for hardware expansion
  • On-board sensors - an ambient light sensor, thermistor, footprint for analog microphone, and footprint for Infineon digital microphone
  • User switches and LEDs
  • USB connector for power, programming, and USB-UART bridge

Kit Contents:
  • Base Board - CYW9BTM2BASE2
  • CYW920820M2IPA1 Bluetooth® Module Evaluation Board (mounted onto baseboard)
  • USB Standard-A to Micro-B cable

The CYW89820 is a stand-alone baseband processor with an integrated 2.4 GHz transceiver supporting LE/BR/EDR. The CYW89820 delivers up to 10.5 dBm Tx power in LE and BR modes and up to 4 dBm in EDR mode that extends range in applications like Automotive Keyless Entry, Remote Parking, Sensor Control, Wake-up trigger for Telematics units etc. The CYW89820 employs high integration to reduce external components, thereby minimizing the device's footprint and cost. This kit helps evaluate device functionality and develop applications quickly for faster time-to-market.

board.name: CYW989820M2EVB-01
board.summary:
The Infineon AIROC™ CYW89820 Bluetooth® and Bluetooth® LE evaluation kit (CYW989820M2EVB-01) enables evaluation, prototyping, and development of a wide array of IoT applications using the AIROC™ CYW89820, an ultra-low-power dual-mode Bluetooth® 5.4 system on chip.

The AIROC™ CYW89820 Bluetooth® and Bluetooth® LE system on chip provides reliable Bluetooth® connectivity, core spec compliant to 5.4, along with high-performance compute capability integrating an Arm® Cortex®-M4 processor with floating point unit.

It is a highly integrated device which delivers up to 11.5 dBm transmit output power in LE and BR modes and up to 2 dBm in EDR mode. The AIROC™ CYW89820 is designed to support a wide range of Bluetooth® use cases for automotive and industrial applications. This kit helps evaluate device functionality and develop applications quickly for faster time-to-market.
board.prov_capabilities: ble br_edr mesh hid ota peps hal btsdk fw2 CYW989820M2EVB_01 CYW208XX
board.description:
Kit Features:
  • 48-WQFN CYW89820 dual-mode (LE/BR/EDR) Bluetooth® 5.4-compliant wireless MCU with internal Power Amplifier (iPA)
  • Arduino compatible headers for hardware expansion
  • User switches and LEDs
  • USB connector for power, programming, and USB-UART bridge

Kit Contents:
  • Base Board - CYW9BTM2BASE2
  • CYW989820M2IPA1 Bluetooth® Module Evaluation Board (mounted onto baseboard)
  • USB Standard-A to Micro-B cable

board.name: CYW920721M2EVK-02
board.summary: The Infineon CYW920721M2EVK-02 Evaluation Kit enables you to evaluate and develop single-chip Bluetooth® applications using the CYW20721, an ultra-low-power dual-mode Bluetooth® 5.1 wireless MCU device for audio. The CYW20721 is a stand-alone baseband processor with an integrated 2.4 GHz transceiver supporting LE/BR/EDR. The CYW20721 employs high integration to reduce external components, thereby minimizing the device's footprint and cost. This kit helps evaluate device functionality and develop applications quickly for faster time-to-market.
board.prov_capabilities: ble br_edr mesh hid audio ota hal btsdk fw2 CYW920721M2EVK_02 MAX44009EDT
board.description:
Kit Features:
  • CYW20721B2 dual-mode (Bluetooth® LE/BR/EDR) Bluetooth® 5.1-compliant wireless MCU packaged into a SiP Module with external 8TR8211C Low Noise Amplifier and Power Amplifier (eLNA/ePA)
  • Audio Arduino shield with on-board microphones, audio codec chip, headphone and speaker output
  • On-board sensors - an ambient light sensor, thermistor, and footprint for an Infineon digital microphone
  • User switches and LEDs
  • USB connector for power, programming, and USB-UART bridge

Kit Contents:
  • CYW9BTM2BASE1 base board
  • CYW920721M2EPA2 Bluetooth® radio card (mounted on the base board)
  • CYW9BT Audio 3 Arduino shield (pre-assembled on top of the CYW9BTM2BASE1)
  • USB Standard-A to Micro-B cable
  • Power Adapter

board.name: CYW920736M2EVB-01
board.summary: The Infineon CYW920736M2EVB-01 Evaluation kit enables you to evaluate and develop single-chip Bluetooth® Low Energy applications using the AIROC™ CYW20736 Bluetooth® Low Energy system on chip. The CYW20736 is a stand-alone baseband processor with an integrated 2.4 GHz transceiver supporting Bluetooth® LE and core spec compliant to 5.4. The CYW20736 employs high integration to reduce external components, thereby minimizing the device's footprint and cost. This kit helps evaluate device functionality and develop remote applications quickly for faster time-to-market.

Kit Features:
  • 32-QFN AIROC™ CYW20736 Bluetooth® Low Energy 5.4-compliant system on chip
  • On-board sensors - an ambient light sensor and thermistor
  • User switches and LEDs
  • USB connector for power, programming, and USB-UART bridge

Kit Contents:
  • CYW920736M2EVB-01 Evaluation board
  • CYW920736M2IPA1 Bluetooth® radio card (pre-assembled on base board M.2 connector)
  • USB Standard-A to Micro-B cable
  • Power Adapter

The CYW20835 is a stand-alone baseband processor with an integrated 2.4 GHz transceiver supporting LE. The CYW20835 employs high integration to reduce external components, thereby minimizing the device's footprint and cost. This kit helps evaluate device functionality and develop remote applications quickly for faster time-to-market.

  • Analog microphone
  • 16 buttons: Power, Voice, Up, Down, Left, Right, Select, Back, Home, Menu, Rewind, Play/Pause, Fast Forward, VOL+, VOL-, Mute
  • LEDs for debug only
  • USB connector for power, programming, and USB-UART bridge

board.name: CYBLE-343072-EVAL-M2B
board.summary: The Infineon AIROC™ CYW20835 Bluetooth® LE 5.2 Module Evaluation Kit (CYBLE-343072-EVAL-M2B) enables evaluation, prototyping, and development of a wide array of IoT applications using the AIROC™ CYW20835, an ultra-low-power Bluetooth® LE 5.4 system on chip.
board.prov_capabilities: ble mesh hid audio ota hal btsdk fw2 led2x CYBLE_343072_EVAL_M2B ncu15wf104 button MAX44009EDT
board.description:
The AIROC™ CYW20835 Bluetooth® LE system on chip provides reliable Bluetooth® LE connectivity, core spec compliant to 5.4, along with high-performance compute capability integrating an Arm® Cortex®-M4 processor with floating point unit. It is a highly integrated device integrating multiple serial interfaces, PWMs, analog and digital microphone interfaces, and more. The AIROC™ CYW20835 is designed to support the entire spectrum of Bluetooth® Low Energy use cases for home automation, lighting, accessory, HID, medical, industrial, and sensor nodes as well as being fully Bluetooth® mesh compliant. This Evaluation Kit (CYBLE-343072-EVAL-M2B) includes an Infineon in-house AIROC™ Bluetooth® module hosting the AIROC™ CYW20835 that is globally certified and has PCB antenna integrated, rapidly reducing time-to-market.

The AIROC™ CYW20835 Bluetooth® LE 5.2 Module Evaluation Kit (CYBLE-343072-EVAL-M2B) is supported in the AIROC™ Bluetooth® SDK within ModusToolbox™ Software and Tools with copious code examples and documentation enablement for Bluetooth® LE data transfer, HID and Bluetooth® mesh use cases.
Kit Features:
  • AIROC™ CYW20835 Bluetooth® LE 5.2 Module (CYBLE-343072-02) with integrated PCB antenna
  • Arduino compatible headers for hardware expansion
  • On-board sensors - an ambient light sensor, thermistor, footprint for analog microphone, and footprint for Infineon digital microphone
  • User switches and LEDs
  • USB connector for power, programming, and USB-UART bridge

Kit Contents:
  • Baseboard - CYW9BTM2BASE1
  • CYBLE-343072-EVAL-M2B Bluetooth® Module Evaluation Board (mounted onto baseboard)
  • USB Standard-A to Micro-B cable
